    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Màquines simples</string>
            <string language="en">Simple machines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Maschinen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Machines simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Máquinas simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Macchine semplici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλές μηχανές</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció d'exercicis i problemes sobre les màquines simples (pla inclinat, palanca, roda, politja i cargol). Consta d'una breu introducció teòrica, problemes amb la seva solució i resolució i exercicis d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of exercises and problems on simple machine (inclined plane, lever, wheel, pulley and screw). The unit includes a brief theoretical introduction, problems (with the way to solve them and the final answers), and self-assessment activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la tecnologia</string>
            <string language="en">history of technology</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica (tecnologia)</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics (technology)</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica (tecnología)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tècnica</string>
            <string language="en">technique</string>
            <string language="es">técnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">canvi tecnològic</string>
            <string language="en">technological change</string>
            <string language="es">cambio tecnológico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia</string>
            <string language="en">technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Übungen und Probleme auf einfacher
Maschine (geneigte Fläche, Hebel, Rad, Riemenscheibe und Schraube). 
Die Maßeinheit schließt eine kurze theoretische Einleitung, 
Probleme (mit der Methode, sie und die abschließenden Antworten zu 
lösen) und Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'exercices et de problèmes sur la 
machine simple (avion, levier, roue, poulie et vis inclinés). 
L'unité inclut une brève introduction théorique, des 
problèmes (avec la voie de résoudre eux et les réponses finales), 
et des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos exercícios e dos problemas na 
máquina simples (plano, alavanca, roda, polia e parafuso inclined). 
A unidade inclui uma introdução teórica breve, problemas (com
a maneira resolver os e as respostas finais), e atividades do 
self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di esercitazioni e di problemi sulla
macchina semplice (aereo, leva, rotella, puleggia e vite propensi). 
L'unità include una breve introduzione teorica, i problemi (con
il modo risolvere loro e le risposte finali) e le attività di 
valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των ασκήσεων και των προβλημάτων στην απλή
μηχανή (κεκλιμένοι αεροπλάνο, μοχλός, ρόδα, τροχαλία και βίδα).
Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει μια συνοπτική θεωρητική εισαγωγή, τα 
προβλήματα (με τον τρόπο να λυθούν αυτοί και οι τελικές 
απαντήσεις), και τις δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte der Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker (Technologie)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
